summary: I liked the Vampire Royal Armor but wanted a version without the pauldrons for a sleeker look. So... Here you go.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description: [/b]

I liked the Vampire Royal Armor but wanted a version without the pauldrons for a sleeker look. So... Here you go.

[b]Requirements/Notes:[/b]

-Requires Dawnguard
-For [u]Male[/u] characters only.


[b]Changes:[/b]

1. Edited alpha channel to remove the pauldrons (texture based edit).
2. Darkened outfit.
3. Added Vampire Royal Light Armor to the leather smithing section (un-enchanted).
4. Lowered weight of armor.


[b]Change Log:[/b]

1.1 - Corrected issue with file pointing to invalid mesh/texture.
1.0 - Initial Release.


[b]My Mods:[/b]

Visit [url=http://www.firingsquad.us]WWW.FIRINGSQUAD.US[/url] for the latest news and updates on my mods.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23966]ARVAK[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34211]ALL-MAKER STONES POWER[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24085]AURIELS ARROWS - BLOOD CURSED[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23999]DAWNGUARD VAMPIRIC DRAIN FIX[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24140]VAMPIRE ROYAL LIGHT ARMOR[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24266]SELL THOSE ELDER SCROLLS[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25131]SNEAKY SERANA[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31221]VAMPIRE NO SUN DAMAGE - FOR CLOAKS, HELMETS, & HOODS[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34318]DAWNGUARD & VAMPIRE HORSES[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32895]AUTO UNEQUIP SHIELD[/url]

Don\'t forget to endorse! ;)


[b]Installation: [/b]

1. Use NMM installer.
2. Install manually by adding VampRoyalArmor_Light.esp to Skyrim/Data folder.


[b]Uninstall:[/b]

1. Deactivate with NMM.
2. Remove VampRoyalArmor_Light.esp from Skyrim/Data folder.


[b]Contact: [/b]

You can contact me here or my personal website forums [url=http://www.firingsquad.us]WWW.FIRINGSQUAD.US[/url]
author: Hobbs
